Package com.cafean.utils

Class NrcDBConv

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cafean.utils.NrcDBConv
  • public class NrcDBConv
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to manage engineering unit codes for NRC Databank data channels.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static double INVALID_DOUBLE  
      static NrcDBUnits[] nrcDBunits
      An array of structures to hold data for each channel type.

    • Method Detail

      • getTitle

        public static java.lang.String getTitle​(int index)
        Data channel title access routine.
        Parameters:
        index - The units index identifying the entry in the nrcDBunits array for this channel.
        Returns:
        The data channel title (does not include units string).

      • getUnitsSI

        public static java.lang.String getUnitsSI​(int index)
        SI units label access routine.
        Parameters:
        index - The units index identifying the entry in the nrcDBunits array for this channel.
        Returns:
        The SI units label.

      • getUnitsBritish

        public static java.lang.String getUnitsBritish​(int index)
        British units label access routine.
        Parameters:
        index - The units index identifying the entry in the nrcDBunits array for this channel.
        Returns:
        The british units label.

      • convertValue

        public static double convertValue​(boolean useSI,
                                  int index,
                                  double val)
        Convert a value to the requested units.
        Parameters:
        useSI - If true return SI units, else return british.
        index - The units index identifying the entry in the nrcDBunits array for this channel.
        val - The value to convert.
        Returns:
        The value in the requested units.
